query.author: VFRANCO
query.provider: SELECT usunom FROM epsusu WHERE usucod = @usucod AND usucla = @usucla

query.author: VFRANCO
query.provider: INSERT INTO epsusu (usucod, usucla, usuact, usunom) VALUES (@usucod, @usucla, @usuact, @usunom)

query.author: VFRANCO
query.provider: INSERT INTO epsmat (matpre, matcan, matobs, matcod) VALUES (@matpre, @matcan, @matobs, @matcod)

query.author: VFRANCO
query.provider: INSERT INTO epsmed (meddos, meduni, medfre, meddur, medpos, medobs, medcod) VALUES (@meddos, @meduni, @medfre, @meddur, @medpos, @medobs, @medcod)

query.author: VFRANCO
query.provider: INSERT INTO epslab (labcan, labfre, labobs, labcod) VALUES (@labcan, @labfre, @labobs, @labcod)

query.author: VFRANCO
query.provider: INSERT INTO epspro (proide, procon, proori) VALUES (@proide, @procon, @proori)

query.author: VFRANCO
query.provider: INSERT INTO epsopp (oppcon, opphis, oppori, oppfec, oppest, oppusu) VALUES (@oppcon, @opphis, @oppori, @oppfec, @oppest, @oppusu)
